title:u/pandapaxxy's Season of the Chosen Nightfall Ordeal, Ritual, Season Pass Breakdown, M+KB
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/lnw0v7/nightfall_ordeal_ritual_season_pass_breakdown_mnk/

// The Palindrome
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB): "Overflow is easily one of my favorite perks in all of Destiny 2. Simply walk over special or heavy ammo and not only is your gun reloaded but its mag is doubled? Heck yes. Pair that with the new(ish) one for all perk that gives you better damage from clearing adds? A match made in heaven. If you want more direct damage increases then rampage is your go-to. Never have to reload as long as you can pick up ammo." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,mkb
dimwishlist:item=432476743&perks=1840239774,1087426260,3643424744,4049631843

dimwishlist:item=432476743&perks=3250034553,2420895100,4252909580,2726471870


// The Palindrome
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "For PvP the only stat you want to invest in is range. You could opt for full bore because we’re going for quickdraw so the drop in handling isn’t as bad, but the drop in stability is something I’d try to avoid. Hammer-forged rifling gives the best bump in range without sacrificing any stats. High-caliber rounds offers that extra flinch to help you in duels and the only real PvP perk in the last column is rangefinder." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb
dimwishlist:item=432476743&perks=3250034553,1561002382,706527188,2846385770

// The Palindrome (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB): "Overflow is easily one of my favorite perks in all of Destiny 2. Simply walk over special or heavy ammo and not only is your gun reloaded but its mag is doubled? Heck yes. Pair that with the new(ish) one for all perk that gives you better damage from clearing adds? A match made in heaven. If you want more direct damage increases then rampage is your go-to. Never have to reload as long as you can pick up ammo." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,mkb

// The Palindrome (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "For PvP the only stat you want to invest in is range. You could opt for full bore because we’re going for quickdraw so the drop in handling isn’t as bad, but the drop in stability is something I’d try to avoid. Hammer-forged rifling gives the best bump in range without sacrificing any stats. High-caliber rounds offers that extra flinch to help you in duels and the only real PvP perk in the last column is rangefinder." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb
dimwishlist:item=1481892490&perks=3250034553,1561002382,706527188,2846385770
dimwishlist:item=1481892490&perks=1482024992,1561002382,706527188,2846385770

// Shadow Price
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB): "For PvE I’ll always recommend overflow whenever it’s possible. Overflow just makes playing any PvE content that much easier because one of your weapons is always reloaded and oftentimes has double capacity. [...] One for all can make spreading the damage a lot easier and I find it to be one of the top perks for PvE. If you want something a bit “faster” than opting for swashbuckler will provide that." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,mkb

//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB): "For PvE I’ll always recommend overflow whenever it’s possible. Overflow just makes playing any PvE content that much easier because one of your weapons is always reloaded and oftentimes has double capacity. [...] One for all can make spreading the damage a lot easier and I find it to be one of the top perks for PvE. If you want something a bit “faster” than opting for swashbuckler will provide that." // THE SWARM
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "For PvP anything to maximize range while also making sure not to destroy the stability. A 4C ttk is possible but not if you have to fight the gun and flinch at the same time. I said this a few times already but DO NOT drop the stability. Even on MnK stability does help, and with a weapon as unforgiving as this you really need to hit your shots." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb

// Salvager's Salvo
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB): "The perks and overall utility aren’t bad and it gives New Light’s and players with bad RNG (me) access to an A tier grenade launcher. For PvE I really like the combination of ambitious assassin for double grenades and chain reaction for more boom. But you really can’t go wrong with either of them." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pve,mkb
dimwishlist:item=2060863616&perks=3525010810,3301904089,2010801679,2396489472

dimwishlist:item=2060863616&perks=3525010810,3301904089,3523296417,1546637391


// Salvager's Salvo
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "For PvP the only useful perk is demolitionist. There’s a niche for ambitious assassin and it certainly throws me off whenever I go up against it, but that is few and far between. Vorpal is arguably the better of the two perks but either could work. Punish people who touch cheeks or have more damage against Behemoths I mean supers." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pvp,mkb
dimwishlist:item=2060863616&perks=3525010810,3301904089,3523296417,1546637391

//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB): "I’m happy to see a Breachlight replacement. While not a direct replacement being an energy weapon it does allow some loadout diversity, which is never a bad thing. // Brass Attacks
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "For PvP 3 bursts is all it takes. Rapid hit can make the second or third engagement easier but is definitely not a necessity on this specific type of weapon. For the final perk you really can’t go wrong with most of them, especially because nothing really screams PvP. Wellspring gives you some ability energy tied to your set cooldown tiers, and rampage can make the second gunfight more forgiving in your favor. Either are great options, but neither are specifically PvP perks." Recommended MW: Stability.|tags:pvp,mkb

// Threaded Needle
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "For PvP you’re gonna want to drop the charge time as low as possible. Make it as close to a heavy sniper rifle as you can. Actually, better yet, just use a heavy exotic sniper like Whisper of the Worm. You still styled on other guardians by killing them, AND you’re showing them that you’re using your exotic slot on a heavy weapon." Recommended MW: Charge Time.|tags:pvp,mkb
